channel.title: Client Mega Lag Crashes Comp Virus?
channel.description:
Whenever I run the client I slowly start to lag and then my computer starts making sounds eventually crashing. If I turn it off then everything goes back to normal. Before when I had AVG it said it was virus, but people told me it wasn't dangerous and with Avast it doesn't show up as a virus, so what's going on?
Nevermind I think Malewarebytes crashed my computer...
